title: "Process Intensification in the fields to separate, recycle and reuse wastes through Membrane Technology"
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00306C, Tutorial Review
Swapna Rekha rekha Panda, Sudeep Asthana, krunal J. Suthar, Arvind Madalgi, Amit Kumar, Haresh University Dave, Rakesh Sinha, Koshal Kishor, Ahmad Ismail
Recycling and reusing of wastewater from diversified industries by adopting a simple dynamic of process intensification (PI) has emerged as a promising development route for the chemical process industry due...
